Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Monsters are wandering in Feldrin Ravine and proving dangerous to the locals.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:38#31#hungry ruins hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:38#38#prion destroyers} and {@LinkCreature:38#37#bonecrushers}.

Report to Slevene when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
